## Checklist

- [ ] I have read the [Contributing Guidelines](CONTRIBUTING.md)
- [ ] My changes follow the project's style guidelines
- [ ] I have tested my changes locally (`mkdocs serve`)
- [ ] I have checked for broken links
- [ ] I have updated relevant documentation

### For New Templates

- [ ] Template added to `templates.yaml`
- [ ] Aggregation script tested locally
- [ ] Template grid displays correctly

### For ADRs

- [ ] ADR follows the template format
- [ ] Status is set to "Draft"
- [ ] Ready for LLM Council review
